label: Package Engine (Linux Release)
command: cargo xtask package engine --profile release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --format zip

label: Package Engine (Windows Release)
command: cargo xtask package engine --profile release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu --format zip

label: Package Suite (Linux Release, DEV_MODE on)
command: cargo xtask package full --profile release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --dev-mode enabled --format zip

label: Package Suite (Windows Release, DEV_MODE on)
command: cargo xtask package full --profile release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu --dev-mode enabled --format zip
